job.title: Data Scientist
job.industry: Internet,Health, Wellness and Fitness,Mental Health Care
job.description: stronguDescriptionbrbrbrbrustrongstrongWho are we and why should you join usbrbrstrongul li strongWe help people change their lives BetterHelp is the worlds largest therapy servicestrong We set out on a mission to provide everyone with easy affordable and private access to professional counseling anytime anywhere To date our network of over 15000 licensed accredited and boardcertified therapists have assisted more than 1000000 people Every month our secure website and mobile app facilitate over 5000000 messages chats voice calls and video sessions that help people face lifes challengesli li strongWere taking mental healthcare to the next level strongWe combine clinical care cuttingedge technology and datadriven product development to constantly learn iterate and improve We are relentless in our pursuit of better always questioning the status quo and discovering new ways to get things done and serve our membersli li strongWe are a community that grows together  both professionally and personallystrong Even with our exponential growth our team is kept agile and nimble allowing you to have a huge impact and carve your own path from day one We invest in our teams wellbeing and professional development because we know that business and individual growth go handinhand You will move fast remain flexible and be challenged every day Join usli brbrulstrongWhat are we looking forbrbrbrstrongBetterHelp is looking for a Data Scientist to help us scale and increase our impact You will use data to drive insight into the product and business with a focus on new user growth retention and quality The ideal candidate would have experience analyzing large and complex data sets related to web products Youll be doing plenty of experiment design and posthoc analysis both to support product improvements and business decisions as well as setting up infrastructure and frameworks for more efficient analysisbrbrbrstrongWhat will you dobrbrstrongul liCollaborate with the product team and development team to design effective AB testsli liBe the goto person for product data tracking questions for our engineersli liMonitor and analyze several AB tests with statistical rigor present the data and insights to the team and drive product decisionsli liSlice and dice an enormous amount of data to gain insight on how to improve our productsli liLook at complex problems and come up with testable models and algorithms to optimize the platformli liDevelop theories that can be explored with analysis to help us improveli liSet up BI tools and regular reporting services and interfacesli liLive and breathe SQLli liEnjoy great teamwork have lots of fun and take pride in building a worldclass product that makes a difference on peoples livesli brbrulstrongWhat will you NOT dobrbrstrongul liYou will NOT worry about runway cash left or how much time we have until the next round We have the startup DNA but were fully backed and funded all the way to successli liYou will NOT be confined to your job You will get involved in product marketing business strategy and almost everything we doli liYou will NOT be bogged down by office politics ego or bad attitude Only positive pleasuretoworkwith people allowed hereli liYou will NOT get yourself burned out We work hard but we believe in maintaining sustainable worklife balance Reallyli brbrbrulstronguRequirementsbrbrustrongul liBScMA in a quantitative discipline such as Statistics Math Economics or Engineeringli liAt least 1 year of experience in a quantitative data analysis role involving user behavior eg marketing product and large data setsli liProven success supporting or making business decisions based on your data analysisli liAdvanced experience with SQLli liAdvanced knowledge of statistics especially as it relates to hypothesis testingli liExpert in using tools like R and Python for data analysisli liExperience analyzing AB testsli liExperience with BI tools like Tableau and Lookerli liExperience analyzing large and complex data sets to drive business insights and decisionsli liGreat grasp of numbers with love for data and analytics knowledge of statisticsli
